data_sources.description: Training data for the Titanic dataset, containing passenger details and survival information.
Testing data for the Titanic dataset, containing passenger details without survival information.

data_variables.description: DataFrame containing the training data read from train.csv.
DataFrame containing the testing data read from test.csv.
Series containing the survival status of female passengers.
Series containing the survival status of male passengers.
Features DataFrame with one-hot encoded values for the selected features from the training dataset.
Features DataFrame with one-hot encoded values for the selected features from the test dataset.
Series containing the target variable (Survived) from the training dataset.
RandomForestClassifier model used for predicting survival based on feature inputs.
Array of predictions made by the trained model on the test dataset.
DataFrame containing PassengerId and predicted survival status for the submission.

data_flow.flow: Used to compute survival rates and train the model.
Used for predictions after model training.
Computed to get the survival rate for female passengers.
Printed for analysis of female survival rate.
Computed to get the survival rate for male passengers.
Printed for analysis of male survival rate.
Used as input features for model training.
Used as input features for making predictions on the test dataset.
Used as target variable during model training.
Trained using X and y, then used for making predictions.
Generated by the model using X_test, saved to output.
Saved as submission.csv for model predictions.
